release.change: • updated Su To latest 2.72.
• MultiDpi ## please adjust with few glitches , its not that easy.
• Fixed Private Mode.
• More debloated reduced size from 890 mb to 850 mb.
• Fixed link to action in action memo.
• Removed grey status bar while power saving mode.
• Fixed Screen Cast Fc.
• Nameless Control :
• All New Design For naMMeless Control.
• Added Ability To color Wifi Icon.
• Added Ability To color Signal Icon.
• Added Ability To color Statusbar Icon.
• Added Ability To color Stock Battery.
• Added Ability To Hide/Show Battery Text.
• Added Ability To Hide/Show Battery Percentage Inside Battery.
• Added Ability To Choose Between 3Minit And Stock Battery.
• Added Internet Meter.
• Added Ability To Change Singal Count 4/5/6.
• Quick Panel Mods :
• Added Ability To Hide/Show SFinder n Quick Connect.
• Added Ability To Choose Toggles Numbers.
• Added Ability To Choose Toggles Back Grounds.
• Added Ability To Color Header.
• Added Ability To Color Quick Toggle Back Ground.
• Added Ability To Color Brightness Back Ground.
• Added Ability To Color Sfinder Back Ground.
• Added Ability To Color Clock In Quick Panel Header.
• Added Ability To Color Icons In Quick Panel Header.
• Added Ability To Color Notifications Back Ground.
• Added Ability To Hide/Show On Going Notifications.
• Added Heads Up Notifications.
• Fixed lock screen setup fc // now you can set lockscreen.
• Removed sd notification // on each boot.
• Removed Knox Info from about device.
• Added Few More Tweaks For stability and battery.
• Added all apps in multi window.
• All New naMMeless Control :.
• Added Ad blocker in naMMeless control.
• Added Battery Callibration.
• Added gradient statusbar.
• Added working Xposed For MM 910 G too.
• Added clock mods / center/left/right and much more.
• Added ram cleaner in quick setting panel.
• Added next alaram on lock screen.
• Added auto call record.
• Added call end delay.
• Added toggle for incremental ringtone.
• Added quick toggle count.
• Added option to switch between quad view and stock multi window view.
• Added bloatware in naMMeless control.
First release
